# code-review
code-review 是一个命令行的，零配置的代码评审辅助工具

![alt text](http://gitlab.baidu.com/shiwenzhe/code-review/raw/master/raw/example.png)

# 安装
> npm install git+http://gitlab.baidu.com/shiwenzhe/code-review.git -g

没有npm? 点击http://nodejs.org/download/ 下载

## 使用
### 发起评审
> code-review

## grunt中使用
> npm install git+http://gitlab.baidu.com/shiwenzhe/code-review.git --save-dev

```javascript
var codeReview = require('code-review');
  grunt.registerTask('svn', function () {
      var done = this.async();
      codeReview({
            path: 'your path here, default is ./',
            reviewers: ['pre-defined owners', 'can have multiple'],
            owner: 'your name',
            token: 'your own token here'
      });
  });
```

## gulp 中使用
> npm install git+http://gitlab.baidu.com/shiwenzhe/code-review.git --save-dev

```javascript
var codeReview = require('code-review');
gulp.task('svn', function (done) {
    codeReview({
        path: 'your path here, default is ./',
        reviewers: ['pre-defined owners', 'can have multiple'],
        owner: 'your name',
        token: 'your own token here'
    }, function (error, data) {
        console.log(data);
        done();
    });
});
```
